name: Regio Randstad
bossPosition: Chair of Regio Randstad & Regional minister of Flevoland
goal:
Randstad region is a network in Brussels, which represents the common interests of the provinces of Noord-Holland, Zuid-Holland, Utrecht and Flevoland.

The four provinces cooperate in Regio Randstad in order to boost the competitiveness of the Randstad Region in an integrating Europe and to improve the quality of life there. In order to do this, Regio Randstad cooperates specifically on:

• Influencing EU policy and legislation;
• Utilising future EU funding;
• Promoting the Randstad Region in Europe;
• Sharing expertise and skills through international cooperation.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
1. Smart Specialisation
2. Circular economy
3. Energy
4. Regional economy
5. Urban agenda
6. Agrofood
7. Environment and nature
8. Water
